sections.text: The Stanford MBA develops principled, insightful leaders through a rigorous, personalized curriculum that blends foundational general management with experiential learning.
The two‑year program begins with a core curriculum and expands into customized electives, experiential learning, and interdisciplinary study.

items: University and GSB degree requirements per Bulletin
sections.text: Applicants complete the GSB process; degree requirements align with Stanford University policies.
Graduates step into leadership roles across technology, entrepreneurship, finance, and social impact.
